column1: Remapping scheme for Neuronexus probes A1x32-Edge-5mm-20-177-A32 (Ser nrs 92C9, 5950, 9ADA)
Mapping as included in current file taken from ProbeRemapping_allprobes.xlxs (Mapping last updated JT March 7th, 2017). x y coords added in this file

Note probesites are arranged according to anatomical layout: probe ch32 is closest to headstage, probe ch1 is at probe tip ie most ventral (at bottom of collumn); for each of these sites the corresponding Amplipex channel is shown
